requirement_text: The system shall [SYSAUTH00001] authenticate all users before granting access to any functionality.
The system shall [SYSAUTH00002] log all authentication attempts including successful and failed logins.
The system shall [SYSAUTH00003] enforce password complexity requirements of minimum 8 characters.
The system shall [SYSNAV00001] provide a main navigation menu accessible from all pages.
The system shall [SYSNAV00002] display breadcrumb navigation for pages deeper than the main menu.
The system shall [SYSDATA00001] backup all user data daily at 2:00 AM local time.
The system shall [SYSDATA00002] retain backup copies for a minimum of 30 days.
The system shall [SYSRPT00001] generate monthly usage reports for system administrators.
The system shall [SYSRPT00002] export reports in PDF and CSV formats.
The system shall [SYSPERF00001] respond to user requests within 3 seconds under normal load.
